attributes.action: British Government to stop supporting Israel and its war crimes
attributes.additional_details:
We need the British government to stop supporting and allowing the atrocities Isreal is inflicting on the people of Palestine.

Israel needs to be held accountable for taking land that doesn't belong to them.  Give back the Palestinian people their land and comply with all UN resolutions and international law.

The UN security council resolution 242 needs to be implemented. This cannot go on and we need to make a stand.

Way too many people have died or are living in constant fear .  If we don't make a stand today there will no be a Palestine left.

The more signatures we get the more we can put pressure on the UK government to recognize and help the people of Palestine to have back what is rightfully theirs.
